title: Identifies Doppelgangers Between Datasets With PPCC And Meta data
text: Data Doppelgangers: Sample pairs class highly similar hence high chance functional doppelgangers Pairwise Pearson’s Correlation Coefficient: Pearson’s Correlation Coefficeint sample pairs Since computationally tedious test different subsets data cause doppelganger effect, instead identify data doppelgangers, sample pairs highly similar high probability functional doppelgangers. implementation, utilized Pairwise Pearson’s Correlation Coefficient (PPCC) metric similarity define data doppelgangers identified method PPCC data doppelgangers. section “3) Effects functional doppelgangers machine learning”, demonstrate PPCC data doppelgangers identified method functional doppelgangers. show PPCC data doppelgangers identified RC data set, treat batch separate data set try find PPCC data doppelgangers 2 batches. steps use identify PPCC data doppelgangers: PPCC: Pairwise Pearson’s Correlation Coefficient functions carry step 1-5 output results list containing following elements: Batch_corrected: Batch corrected data set PPCC_matrix: Matrix PPCC samples different batch (NumberOfSamplesInBatch1*NumberofSamplesInBatch2) PPCC_df: Data frame PPCC samples different batch (NumberOfSamplePairs*5). columns data frame follows: Sample1: Name first sample pair (first batch) Sample2: Name second sample pair (second batch) PPCC: Pearson’s correlation coefficient sample pair ClassPatient: Label sample pair according class patient id similarity DoppelgangerLabel: Labels sample pair PPCC data doppelganger cut_off: Cut PPCC identification PPCC data doppelgangers sample pairs class different patient PPCC greater cut point visualize PPCC data doppelgangers, pass ppccDoppelgangerResults (output list getPPCCDoppelgangers) visualisePPCCDoppelgangers function.

what: A function to identify PPCC Data Doppelgangers — getPPCCDoppelgangers
title: A function to identify PPCC Data Doppelgangers — getPPCCDoppelgangers
text: function performs following steps identify PPCC data dopplgangers batches: Batch correct batches sva::ComBat Calculate PPCC values samples different batches Label sample pairs according patient id class similarities Calculate PPCC cut point (maximum PPCC "Different Class Different Patient" sample pair) Identify PPCC Data Doppelgangers sample pairs "Class Different Patient" labels PPCC values > PPCC cut-.

title: A function to identify PPCC Data Doppelgangers — getPPCCDoppelgangers
code: getPPCCDoppelgangers(   raw_data,   meta_data,   do.batch.corr = TRUE,   correlation_function = cor )

title: A function to identify PPCC Data Doppelgangers — getPPCCDoppelgangers
text: raw_data Data frame column sample row variable rowname row variable name. meta_data Data frame columns "Class", "Patient_ID", "Batch" indicating class, patient id batch sample respectively row sample name. Ensure sample names rownames data frame separate column data set. .batch.corr False, batch correction carried doppelgangers found correlation_function Correlation function use. Pearson's Correlation Coefficient used default correlation function. User defined functions accept two vector parameters, x y.

title: A function to identify PPCC Data Doppelgangers — getPPCCDoppelgangers
text: list containing PPCC matrix data frame list doppelgangers identified

title: A function to identify PPCC Data Doppelgangers — getPPCCDoppelgangers
text: function also identifies PPCC data doppelgangers within batch (1 batch detected metadata document). case performs following steps: Calculate PPCC values samples within batch Label sample pairs according patient id class similarities Calculate PPCC cut point (maximum PPCC "Different Class Different Patient" sample pair) Identify PPCC Data Doppelgangers sample pairs "Class Different Patient" labels PPCC values > PPCC cut-. Troubleshooting Tips: Ensure (rownames) samples meta_data can found colnames raw_data vice versa.

title: A function to identify PPCC Data Doppelgangers — getPPCCDoppelgangers

what: Renal Cell Carcinoma Proteomics Data Set — rc

text: benchmark proteomics data taken NetProt software library.renal cell carcinoma (RCC) study Guo et al. comprises 24 proteomics runs originating 6 pairs non-tumorous tumorous clear-cell renal carcinoma (ccRCC) tissues, 4 proteomics runs originating pair non-tumorous tumorous chromophobe renal carcinoma (chRCC) tissues 8 proteomics run originating two pairs non-tumorous tumorous papillary renal carcinoma (ppRCC) tissues, duplicates.

Doppel.0 allowed) Try put training-validation columns beside leave column gaps Refer csv file tutorial GitHub README.
